about_the_game:
A recent unknown phenomenon shakes the world with periodic events akin to natural disasters. The newly harsh environment of Agitha pushes Kioyu’s people to the brink of extinction, and now he’s called to become a Hunter for the opportunity to earn a Dry Origin, one of the only solutions to the ails of his home settlement. Follow Kioyu as he rips through monsters on his path to clear the Hunter’s Trials and uncovers the source of his home settlement’s problems.

Features:

- Test your technical combat skills with high-action strategic real-time combat
- Customize your combos with the Action Deck to adjust your strategy according to your opponents.
- Upgrade your attacks as you progress through beautiful yet treacherous dungeon biomes.

Collect items, plan your attack strategy, and explore dungeons with a cast of other characters that each have rich backgrounds on your way to quell the disaster that has begun to plague Agitha!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64).
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WDDM 1.0 or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Flow: Last Origins is a character action roguelite--Take down enemies by customizing your combos with attacks you can collect and synchronize with gems that can change your stats and the status effects you can apply in this unique action-packed RPG!
